Title: Confessions of a French Baker.
Subtitle: Breadmaking Secrets, Tips, and Recipes.
Authors: Peter Mayle;Gerard Auzet.
Categories: Cooking.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=rp4wfvuZ3QoC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A behind-the-scenes look at the art of French breadmaking includes sixteen recipes from the award-winning Provencal baker, Gerard Auzet, and includes tips for adapting recipes to the American kitchen..
